channel.title: Omg this is stupid! please help!
channel.description:
[b]This really annoys me...[/b]
I'm trying to make my server, chewbaccascape.no-ip.biz aaannndd....
Ok, I have my server files, I open up the compiler type "run" and this is what it says:
":: Port :: 43594 :: Running usind JDK 1.6.0_05... 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. :: Failed! Press any key to continue . . ."
I downloaded every JDK and JRE update/starter files.
[size=30pt][b][u]ANY HELP PLEASE??!![/u][/b][/size] And when I get the server done, whoever helps me, (If you join) will be able to choosee....
Mod Admin All costom items in game and unlimited supply of cash (for 2 months) To have bragging rights To enslave everyone in jail ('cept mods, admins, and owners!) So, please help me!!! :P

item.title: Omg this is stupid! please help!
item.dc:creator: @sig00 sig00
item.description:
@sig00 wrote:

Heres what you need to do, right click on the run.bat and click edit. Notepad will pop up and it will say something like this
@echo off
cd …/bin
color 0a
Title NineScape
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\java.exe” Bulby/Server 43594

where it says Java\jdk1.6.0_16 change 16 (or whatever yours is to whatever jdk you have) and there you go problem solved!

Read full topic
item.source: Omg this is stupid! please help!

item.title: Omg this is stupid! please help!
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

Either you need to install Java, or you need to fix the link to your Java.exe file.

If you need any help doing this, please feel free to ask me.

Read full topic
